with pytest.raises(SubscriberError):
    subscriber.subscribe(topic_url='http://example.com', hub_url=
        'http://localhost:5001/hub', lease_seconds=-1)
with pytest.raises(SubscriberError):
    subscriber.subscribe(topic_url='http://example.com', hub_url=
        'http://unexisting')
with pytest.raises(SubscriberError):
    subscriber.subscribe(topic_url='http://example.com', hub_url=
        'http://localhost:5002/ping')
